description:
Even while apart, Mocha and Cocoa continue to inspire one another. Meanwhile, Chino finds inspiration through all of her friends — but especially through Cocoa.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Can Take That Step Forward Because You Are Watching
Sono Ippo wa Kimi o Mite Iru kara Fumidaseru
その一歩は君を見ているから踏み出せる
